description:
| Nowadays everyone wants to bring Agile Best Practices into all the
  teams, but it's a hard task to implement it and adapt based on
  different teams. Setting up all necessary Agile meetings and using
  buzz words is not enough for the team to be happy and successful while
  working in Agile environment.
| Inspired by the "Divine Comedy" by Dante Alighieri, I decided to
  create a short guide into Agile best practices. It will guide through
  Failures, Challenges to the Success in building a happy dream team!
| This talk is divided into three parts:
| 1. Failures in setting up Agile processes for a team.
| 2. Challenges on the way to happy and successful team.
| 3. Successful examples how to have happy and productive Agile team and
  constantly deliver a great product.
title: The Agile comedy: from hell to paradise
